CustomField.formula: IF($User.Id = "0050Y000000oRHI", "bizdev@trustedshops.de", IF(OR($User.UserRoleId = "00E0Y000000xbpG", $User.UserRoleId = "00E0Y000000xbpL",$User.UserRoleId = "00E1v000001mTbJ", CONTAINS($UserRole.Name , "High Touch"), AND(ISPICKVAL(Account.Kundensegment__c, "Key Account"), $User.Alias ="senge",$User.Alias ="truohu", $User.Alias ="trumsc")), "keyaccount@trustedshops.com", IF(OR($User.UserRoleId = "00E0Y000000i2fr", $User.UserRoleId = "00E0Y000000i2fw",$User.Alias ="trusgu2",$User.UserRoleId = "00E1v000001mTap", $User.UserRoleId = "00E1v000001mTb9"), "contract@trustedshops.com", IF(OR($Profile.Name = "Finance Accounting", RecordType.Name = "Finance"), "finance@trustedshops.com", CASE(RecordType.Name, "Customer Support", "members@trustedshops.com", "Onboarding", "onboarding@trustedshops.com", "Product Integration", "productintegration@trustedshops.com", "Contract", "contract@trustedshops.com", "Risk", "riskservices@trustedshops.com", "members@trustedshops.com")))))
CustomField.label: zz Signature Email
